mapper.sql: member_id, org_id, member_name, dept_id, post_id, role_id, education, marital_status, onenet_owner, member_status, sex, birthday, emergency_user, emergency_mobile, applicate_date, update_datetime, entry_date, leave_date, id_card_exp, native_place, animal,id_card,blank_id,blank_name
mapper.select: SELECT member_id ,member_name FROM ab_member_tab WHERE org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ab_member_tab (member_id, org_id, member_name, dept_id, post_id, role_id, education, marital_status, onenet_owner, member_status, sex, birthday, emergency_user, emergency_mobile, applicate_date, update_datetime, entry_date, leave_date, leave_date, id_card_exp, native_place, animal,id_card,blank_id,blank_name ) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{education,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{maritalStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{onenetOwner,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{memberStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{emergencyUser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{emergencyMobile,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{applicateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{entryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{leaveDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{id_card_exp,jdbcType=DATE}, #{native_place,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{animal,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{blankId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{blankName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update ab_member_tab
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
post_id = #{postId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
education = #{education,jdbcType=TINYINT},
marital_status = #{maritalStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
onenet_owner = #{onenetOwner,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
member_status = #{memberStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
emergency_user = #{emergencyUser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
emergency_mobile = #{emergencyMobile,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
applicate_date = #{applicateDate,jdbcType=DATE},
update_datetime = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
entry_date = #{entryDate,jdbcType=DATE},
leave_date = #{leaveDate,jdbcType=DATE},
id_card_exp = #{idCardExp,jdbcType=DATE},
native_place = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
animal = #{animal,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ab_member_tab set org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, post_id = #{postId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, education = #{education,jdbcType=TINYINT}, marital_status = #{maritalStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, onenet_owner = #{onenetOwner,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, member_status = #{memberStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, emergency_user = #{emergencyUser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, emergency_mobile = #{emergencyMobile,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, applicate_date = #{applicateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, update_datetime = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, entry_date = #{entryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, leave_date = #{leaveDate,jdbcType=DATE}, id_card_exp = #{idCardExp,jdbcType=DATE}, native_place = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, animal = #{animal,jdbcType=TINYINT} where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select amt.member_id, amt.member_name, adt.dept_name, apt.post_name, amt.education, amt.marital_status, amt.sex, amt.birthday, amt.id_card_exp, amt.native_place, amt.animal, amt.emergency_user, amt.emergency_mobile, amt.applicate_date, amt.entry_date, amt.leave_date, amt.member_status, amt.id_card, amt.blank_id, amt.blank_name, amt.onenet_owner from ab_member_tab amt inner join ab_dept_tab adt on amt.dept_id = adt.dept_id inner join ab_post_tab apt on amt.post_id = apt.post_id where amt.member_status = #{status} and amt.org_id = #{orgId}
and amt.member_name like #{filter}

select amt.member_id, amt.member_name, adt.dept_name, apt.post_name, amt.education, amt.marital_status, amt.sex, amt.birthday, amt.id_card_exp, amt.native_place, amt.animal, amt.emergency_user, amt.emergency_mobile, amt.applicate_date, amt.entry_date, amt.leave_date, amt.member_status, amt.id_card, amt.blank_id, amt.blank_name,amt.onenet_owner from ab_member_tab amt inner join ab_dept_tab adt on amt.dept_id = adt.dept_id inner join ab_post_tab apt on amt.post_id = apt.post_id where amt.org_id = #{orgId}
and amt.member_name like #{filter}
select aot.org_id, aot.org_name from ab_member_tab amt inner join ab_org_tab aot on amt.org_id = aot.org_id where amt.onenet_owner = #{username}
select detail_id as id, label, content from ab_member_detail_tab where member_id = #{id} and category = 'tel'
select detail_id as id, label, content from ab_member_detail_tab where member_id = #{id} and category = 'email'
select detail_id as id, label, content from ab_member_detail_tab where member_id = #{id} and category = 'address'
select detail_id as id, label, content from ab_member_detail_tab where member_id = #{id} and category = 'other'

select amt.member_id, amt.member_name, adt.dept_name, apt.post_name, amt.education, amt.id_card, amt.blank_id, amt.blank_name, amt.marital_status, amt.sex, amt.birthday, amt.id_card_exp, amt.native_place, amt.animal, amt.emergency_user, amt.emergency_mobile, amt.applicate_date, amt.entry_date, amt.leave_date, amt.member_status from ab_member_tab amt inner join ab_dept_tab adt on amt.dept_id = adt.dept_id inner join ab_post_tab apt on amt.post_id = apt.post_id where amt.onenet_owner = #{username} and amt.org_id = #{orgId}

select amt.member_id, amt.member_name, amt.education, amt.marital_status, amt.sex, amt.id_card, amt.blank_id, amt.blank_name, amt.birthday, amt.id_card_exp, amt.native_place, amt.animal, amt.emergency_user, amt.emergency_mobile, amt.applicate_date, amt.entry_date, amt.leave_date, amt.member_status from ab_member_tab amt where amt.member_id = #{memberId} and amt.org_id = #{orgId}
